entry.title: Learn C# in 7 Days : Day 3
entry.content:
Learning C# for beginners can be little difficult in the first place. But it isn’t that difficult.

When starting to learn C# you should start with the basics and not get into the deep rabbit hole of it.

This is Day 3 of Learn C# in 7 Days. Checkout Day 2 before starting with Day 3.

Topics we’ll be discussing

  • Inheritance
  • Overriding
  • Abstract Class
  • Interfaces

Inheritance
